Name: TruthGundlach
Text: The Democratic debate is about half over.  Unequivocal  winner is already obvious: President Trump. There seems to be no Democratic vision.

Text: I will give Bloomberg credit for one thing. Having the wisdom to realize this debate culling process is poor.  There has to be a better way.
